system.description:
This School of magic is concerned with the element of water. This also includes ice, as well other liquids including acids, poisons and oils. Spells from this School require strong, clear gestures to be cast, as well as words of power.

Spontaneous Casting Complexities

ComplexityEffect
0

Create, destroy or control liquid; inflict Health damage with ice or acid

1

Find the nearest water; freeze a liquid

2

Create an incapacitating poison

3

Create a lethal poison

4

Turn water into vapour
